select a.id,a.create_by,a.create_time,a.destination,a.destination_dept_name,a.appointment_status,a.source,a.symptoms,a.telphone,a.type, a.xcx_open_id ,a.is_visit,a.person_id, a.visit_name, a.visit_phonenumber,a.visit_start_time,a.visit_time,a.visit_remark, b.person_name, b.mobile, b.id_num from app_person_wx a left join app_person b on a.person_id = b.person_id where 1=1
and b.person_name like CONCAT('%',#{queryDTO.personName},'%')
and b.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{queryDTO.mobile},'%')
and b.id_num like CONCAT('%',#{queryDTO.idNum},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{queryDTO.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{queryDTO.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and a.destination like CONCAT('%',#{queryDTO.destination},'%')
and a.visit_phonenumber = #{queryDTO.phonenumber}
and a.xcx_open_id is null
and a.xcx_open_id is not null
order by a.create_time desc

select a.id,c.create_time as createTime,c.xcx_open_id as openId,c.appointment_status as appointmentStatus,c.destination,c.symptoms,b.person_name as personName ,b.mobile ,b.id_num as idNum,c.cId,a.destination,a.visit_name,a.visit_remark,a.visit_start_time,a.visit_phonenumber,a.is_assistant as isAssistant,a.patient_name as patientName,a.patient_num as patientNum,a.patent_relation as patentRelation,c.content,c.contact_history,c.risk_position,c.update_time,b.person_id,c.epidemic_history from app_person_wx a left join app_person b on a.person_id = b.person_id left join (select id as cId,app_person_wx_id ,max(create_time) as create_time,symptoms,destination,appointment_status,xcx_open_id,destination_dept_name,content,contact_history,risk_position, update_time,epidemic_history from app_person_wx_visit where 1 = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{queryDTO.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{queryDTO.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY cId,app_person_wx_id ,symptoms,destination,appointment_status,xcx_open_id,destination_dept_name,content,contact_history,risk_position, update_time,epidemic_history) as c on c.app_person_wx_id = a.id where 1=1
and b.person_name like CONCAT('%',#{queryDTO.personName},'%')
and b.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{queryDTO.mobile},'%')
and b.id_num like CONCAT('%',#{queryDTO.idNum},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{queryDTO.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{queryDTO.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and a.destination like CONCAT('%',#{queryDTO.destination},'%')
and a.visit_phonenumber = #{queryDTO.phonenumber}
order by c.create_time desc
